_header: O blessed child Jesu what hast Thou to do
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, ‘Inuocacio ad ihesum’ — ten stanzas rhyme royal

HunHM744.First Lines:
O blessid chyld Ihesu what haast thow doþat for vs shuldist
                    souffre swich Iewyse…
HunHM744.Last Lines:
…And graunte vs grace thee to loue & dredeAnd yeue vs
                    heuene whan þat we be dede
HunHM744.Editions:
Gollancz,  Israel,
                        ed.  
             Hoccleve’s Works: The Minor Poems. vol. 2.  EETS
         e.s. 73 (1925); repr. with 61, 1970: 5-7.
